Synopsis: Creates a new HTML anchor element.
Description: This function creates a new HTML anchor element (<a>) with specified attributes.
Notes: This function is part of a set of functions for generating HTML elements.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code: New-HTMLAnchor -Target _parent Creates an anchor element with the target attribute set to "_parent". New-HTMLAnchor -Id "show_$RandomNumber" -Href '#' -OnClick "show('$RandomNumber');" -Style "color: #ffffff; display:none;" -Text 'Show' Creates an anchor element with specified attributes and text. Output: Show
